Articles.Content: Banned for typing in stead rather than outside of it.
Banned for default profile picture.
Banned for the half of rocket on the signature picture.
Banned for not giving me a van similar to the one in Ant-Man and the Wasp. No, not the brown-ish van with the La Cucaracha horn, I mean the grey colored Mercedes sprinter van.
Banned for being long winded
Banned for being short winded.
Banned for being short winged.
Banned for insulting the second best Convair aircraft (behind the B-36).
Banned for hiding the second best Convair aicraft behind the B-36 as it is something bad.
Banned because this argument has been going on too long.

Banned for aiming the signature rocket exactly at the profile plane.

Or vice versa, crossing the rocket way by plane.
Banned for referencing someone's signature.
banned for calling connecticut konnecticut
Also banned because as there is Connecticut, there whould be Disconnecticut.
Banned for wielding witticism incorrectly.
Banned for being from America.
Banned for living in the cold.
banned for banning someone cuz they lived in the cold
Banned both of them because Canada is in America, too, so America lives in cold.
banned for saying Canada is in America while Canada is in the continent of North America

Banned for North America is still America, Just North.

For reasons they call the Northern North America Canada.
Banned for ambiguous use of North America the continent and America the country.

Banned for making me suppose North American America as a name of the mainland of a country belonging to the continent. (So, except the Pacific islands).

In this case we can say that the Northern North America is to the North from the North American America.

Also this means that the North American America is to the South from the Northern North America, between it and the Northern South America.

And between the North American America and the Northern South America there is the Southmost North America, or the Northern Central America.

It's named Central after the Kerbal Space Center, because KSP has been created exactly there.

Edited June 25, 2021 by kerbiloid
Banned for a wall of text.
Banned for making me explain the obvious things.
